  3. Your AI products' values and behaviors can make or break your business. Here's how to get them right  Fortune
  4. Deloitte Study: Ethical Use Guides C-level Decisions About Workforce Preparation for AI  PR Newswire
  5. AI won't take your job or business. The people who learn and apply AI will  CampaignLive

item.title: Microsoft begins blocking some terms that caused its AI tool to create violent, sexual images - CNBC
item.description:
1. Microsoft begins blocking some terms that caused its AI tool to create violent, sexual images  CNBC
  2. Censored Microsoft Copilot can still make vulgar images  Windows Central
  3. Copilot can't stop emitting violent, sexual images, says Microsoft whistleblower  The Register
  4. Microsoft's Copilot now blocks some prompts that generated violent and sexual images  Engadget
  5. Microsoft Engineer Sickened by Images Its AI Produces  Futurism
